meanings.definition: A leader or chief in a Muslim community.
meanings.sent1: The sheikh guided the community with wisdom and kindness.
meanings.sent2: The sheikh was highly respected by all the people in the village.
meanings.sent3: The sheikh tried to lead a group of ducks, but they just quacked at him.
meanings.sent4: The sheikh stood tall like a mountain among his people.
meanings.sent5: The sheikh's presence was as commanding as a lion in the savanna.

meanings.definition: A title of respect for a Muslim man.
meanings.sent1: Everyone in the mosque addressed him as sheikh out of respect.
meanings.sent2: The sheikh graciously accepted the title given to him by the community.
meanings.sent3: The sheikh jokingly said he should change his name to 'Mr. Respect'.
meanings.sent4: The sheikh's demeanor was as dignified as a king in his court.
meanings.sent5: The sheikh's title carried as much weight as a crown on his head.
